column4: Hello everyone, my first IRC chat using Ubuntu.  is anyone able to explain in simple terms, how to copy cds?
- there are several cd burning programs, i think serpentine is the default one for 5.10
- my bad, serpentine doesn't do exact copies of cds, is that what you want to do?
- yes, it works fine
i would install them with either synaptic or apt-get, have you used those two programs before?
they should be installed already, and they are programs that you use to install OTHER programs
look in your system menu, under 'Administration' and it's called synaptic package manager
- ok, search for k3b, check mark it and 'apply' the changes with the button
it didnt find k3b? hold on...
- i'm not sure why synaptic didnt find k3b, are you sure you typed it write? it took me a full year to call the program k3b, and not kb3.
i use the search button
no, just serach be name
it get its info from the same place, we may need to add some repositories to synaptic
- go to settings, repositories....
then click '+ADD' button
make sure the bottom two checkboxes are checked, as well as the others on the top
- ok, are they checked? multiverse and universe? click 'ok' and 'ok' again
check mark it, and 'apply' button
- you dont live in amsterdam do you?
- lol, nevermind then. ;)
never heard of either of them, and I like trance music, i usually more goa/psy
you got a webpage or mixes available on the 'net?
